xhtml.body:
Release notes
Version 1.6.4
Fixed a bug where the configuration preferences were not saving under windows. So much for cross platform ; ;lt; Added a small patch designed to fix a problem where the callerid function is called with the incorrect case. This may fix the problem with caller id not being set that some users have reported.
If you have feature requests or installation/configuration problems post them at http://forums.noojee.com.au
